sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Conversation Analytics one time virtual agent application registration</description>
        <name>CA Register Chat Application</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var sender = new CASender();
var caPopulateFlattenFields = new CAPopulateFlattenFields();
try {
    sender.registerApplication();
} catch (error) {
    gs.error("Error while registering the application :" + error);
}
try {
    caPopulateFlattenFields.populateFlattenFields();
} catch (error) {
    gs.error("Error while populating the flatten fields :" + error);
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-10-01 14:56:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>29adad96732310108564b17afef6a77b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CA Register Chat Application</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Conversational Analytics" source="sn_ci_analytics">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Conversational Analytics">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_29adad96732310108564b17afef6a77b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 12:31:40</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
